column5: After viewing numerous posts on this site, though I would add my 2 cents worth...  As an outsider, I had always admired the candid answers to the posted questions and the information that has been provided.  To that end, I would like to let you guys ( & girls) how we made out on Nipissing.  We went to Sandy Bay last week, had a great time, fishing was ... reasonable, the service, and the cottage we stayed in was great.  We caught perch and walleye ( mostly within the slot size that ended up going back) throughout the day, one pike, and herring and even a mud puppy.  We had a great time, would do it again.
Welcome to our OFC family Peti. Nice to hear you got out and did a bit of ice fishing.
Seems everyone catches mudpuppies on nippissing.... next thing yanno they will be considered tablefare!   LOL welcome to the board brother!! Enjoy you flight.   Gerritt.
Five bucks says GCD has a mudpuppy recipe. Welcome to the site, Peti !
Welcome aboard.  This is a great family to be a part of.
Sound like ya had a good trip, welcome...
